function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased car ownership at the expense of mass transit, leading to higher emissions","Impact":"Worsening air pollution, exacerbating climate change, and increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Promoting and incentivizing the use of public transportation, carpooling, and alternative transportation options","Technologies":"Smart public transportation systems, electric vehicles, and sustainable urban planning","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, urban planners, and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Unsustainable use of natural resources and generation of significant solid waste","Impact":"Jeopardizing the planet's resource supply, increasing environmental burden, and contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing circular economy practices, reducing waste generation, and promoting sustainable resource management","Technologies":"Waste recycling technologies, sustainable manufacturing processes, and resource optimization systems","People":"Industry stakeholders, waste management professionals, and environmental organizations","Owner":"Businesses, policymakers, and environmental regulators"},{"Description":"Projected increase in global resource demand by 2050","Impact":"Strain on natural resources, exacerbation of environmental degradation, and heightened risk of resource-related infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in sustainable resource management, promoting resource efficiency, and developing eco-friendly technologies","Technologies":"Resource-efficient technologies, renewable energy systems, and sustainable agricultural practices","People":"Global population, future generations, and marginalized communities","Owner":"International organizations, policymakers, and research institutions"}]}
